transcript:
Ja vyakti is aap call kelela hai.
Hello.
Hello.
Hanji sir bataiye. Shivika baat kar rahi hu India Mart se.
Achcha. Madam ye apply kar diya hai loan ke liye.
Achcha, theek hai.
Kal apna baat hua tha na iske regarding. So apply kar diye hai online process thoda sa waha par aapke back end par dekh lijiye na call back aate hain ki thoda sa.
Sir actually iske bare mein na mujhe apne senior se discuss karna padega aur aaj thoda sa mera tabiyat down tha to main abhi thodi late pahunchne wali hu office. To aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye.
Actually kya hai maine maine do teen jagah Yes bank mein HDFC mein aur Parimal finance mein teeno jagah apply kiya tha na waha se call back aane aur offers aana chalu ho gaye na. To main main soch raha tha India Mart ke sath kam karne ka. To thoda sa dekhiye na madam kya kar sakte hain isme.
Thik hai aap bas correct half an hour ka mere ko time dijiye. Main office pahunchte hi pehle aapka problem solve karti hu.
Thik hai, thik hai.
Okay. Thank you sir.
Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer applied for a loan.

- Wants to work with IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive will solve the problem after reaching office.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- loan, callback, offers, apply
